case.title: I'm as real as a man gets! Can make u happy! - 27 (Brooklyn )
case.text:
Hi i am 27 years old live in Brooklyn i own a performance and retail car shop!! i love to work make good money and be very independent , i live alone i got an apartment and i drive, i dont smoke or drink never have i dont do any time of drugs, i been kickboxing all my life, i live life each day as it comes i fear nothing or no one and respect does who respect me, i believe everything in life has a reason ever choice we make is a lesson mistake or what we wanted at the time, life is short i dont like games , i do love playing pool , watching a good horror movie , go to a nice cafe, swmming, and other stuff i like action movies and hip hop , R n B rap and lots othere music, i dont depend on no one i make eanugh to live life on the top!! if you wanna know more please ask thanx ;-)
LIVE LIFE TO THE FULLEST MAKE EACH MOMENT COUNT AND LAST ! I FIGHT WITH COURGE I DON'T EVER GIVE UP !! Everything HAS A REASON EVERY CHOICE AND EVER MOVE!
Lets chat got more pics if u got ;) THREE FOUR SEVEN THREE SEVEN ONE THREE ONE FIVE ONE Thanx !!!
